title: Requesting Chat Time-Out Limit On Self
body:
I am requesting a chat restriction, self induced by myself. 

The people in this game trigger me, and I don't want to be banned for toxicity. So, please help me and give me a chat restriction.

(Im not entirely sure where to be posting this, so posted it here)

replies.body: Sadly, I can't place a chat restriction on your account even if you request it =\ . Doing so could mess up a few of the systems, and I believe it would also lock you out of hextech loot as well. If you want more context on why I can't do this, reach out to our player behavior team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll be more than happy to go over it all in detail with you.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=KNEn3F9k,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-06-19T02:30:03.254+0000)
>
> Sadly, I can't place a chat restriction on your account even if you request it =\ . Doing so could mess up a few of the systems, and I believe it would also lock you out of hextech loot as well. If you want more context on why I can't do this, reach out to our player behavior team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll be more than happy to go over it all in detail with you.

I understand. Thank you for the response. I will try hard to limit my foul language, and not be toxic. Thank you again for the response. I understand what you mean.
